felix.chen.ib_carpool.Controllers

Class UserProfileActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • felix.chen.ib_carpool.Controllers.UserProfileActivity

  • public class UserProfileActivity
extends java.lang.Object
    This class displays the user's information. It also shows the user's vehicles in a recyclerview.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bookRide(View v)
      If the user has a booked ride, go to vehicleProfileActivity for the booked ride, otherwise go to vehiclesInfoActivity
      void checkIfBooked()
      Checks if the user has already booked a ride, changes "book ride" button to "current ride" if a ride is already booked
      void getUser()
      Gets user from firebase and sets on screen user info calls getUserVehicles and checkIfBooked
      void getUserVehicles()
      Gets all vehicles belonging to the user from firebase and adds it to the user's arraylist of owned vehicles
      void goAddVehicles(View v)
      Goes to addVehicleActivity
      protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) 
      void signOut(View v)
      Signs user out of the app, go to signInActivity

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
